column5: Just came back from a quick run to Barrie, man oh man was it pouring,  I have visions of the water levels coming up in a great burst overnight.  Looked on the weather radar and looked like Lew-ville over towards Peterborough was really getting hosed.   Keep the kiddies away from the water, don't need any accidents.
I hope the docks survive at the cottage this year!
Here in Montreal too !! The ice edge is at least 400 feet closer to shore now on the river.Play safe everyone
